page.title: 20Summary of block-Rhenigidale
page.content: The pages in this block have because of the nature of this area mainly centred on the village of{Rhenigidale. We have tried to give the reader a taste of life in this isolated village which hopefully will soon be linked to the rest of the{Western Isles}by a vehicular road. There is a lot of work going on outside throughout the day with little time left for recreation. We have televisions and radios etc. and in the long, dark winter evenings these entertain us as well as{ceilidhs in each others homes. We look forward to meeting you some day. You might be surprised at the far-flung countries we get visitors from! {Goodbye}from Rhenigidale School. {MOIRA H. MACKAY} (Teacher) { M. FIONA MACKAY }(Pupil).
